definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to lock one's door and refuse to see sb
to tactfully decline/to turn down gracefully
to refuse to accept a payment/to refuse to pay/to stop (a check or payment)
distributed denial of service (DDOS) form of Internet attack
pinyin: fen1 bu4 shi4 ju4 jue2 fu2 wu4

definition: to beat a tiger from the front door, only to have a wolf come in at the back (idiom); fig. facing one problem after another
pinyin: qian2 men2 ju4 hu3 , hou4 men2 jin4 lang2

definition: to reject sb after being deeply touched by them (Internet slang)
to reject/to refuse to take a call

sentences.english: Are you worrying about the non-execution of the contract and non-payment on our part?
sentences.chinese: 你可否憂鬱我們不履行合同或者拒不付款？

sentences.english: The traitor refused to confess and was racked at last.
sentences.chinese: 叛徒拒不招供，最後被拖到拉肢刑架上施刑。

sentences.english: Yet Yama keeps me outside the gate.
Although conclusive evidence, but Hong Lin still has pleaded not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 雖然證據確鑿，但林洪還是拒不認罪。

sentences.english: They were also made aware that Villarreal had offers rejected also.
sentences.chinese: 他們同時意識到維拉里爾對盧神的報價同樣被拒。
被拒牽後的申請者可以重新申請嗎？

sentences.english: So in diplomatic terms, the Kitty Hawk refusal was a pretty sharp rebuke.
sentences.chinese: 因此從外交層面來看，小鷹號被拒是相當尖銳的指責。

sentences.english: Has any insurer ever cancelled or declined your products liability?
sentences.chinese: 以往有無保險公司退保或拒保貴司產品責任險？

sentences.english: Have you ever been refused a student visa to any other country?
sentences.chinese: 您是否曾被任何其他國家拒簽過？

sentences.english: The stone-hearted man refused to help the old man.
sentences.chinese: 這個鐵石心腸的人拒幫助那位老人。

sentences.english: Mr Lien and Mr Soong asked for a meeting with Mr Chen, but have been turned down.
sentences.chinese: 連戰和宋楚瑜要求和陳水扁見面，但被拒。

sentences.english: His application for US citizenship was  subsequently denied, and he was detained after applying to leave America.
sentences.chinese: 其美國公民申請被拒，而後申請離美時被拘。

sentences.english: If it refuses to make correction, it shall be revoked the Practicing License of Medical Institution.
sentences.chinese: 拒不改正的，吊銷其《醫療機構執業許可證》。

sentences.english: She refused nothing, and he asked nothing.
If you're told that you can't donate blood because of low hemoglobin, make an appointment with your doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果獻血時你因血紅蛋白過低而被拒，去看醫生吧。

sentences.english: In the event of refusal to return such property, compulsory execution shall be carried out.

cannot/to not be able (to)/to be unable to
